review.classdesign.jammy.addons.java

Class JavaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.addons.java.JavaManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILanguageManager

    public final class JavaManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILanguageManager
    ILanguageManager implementation for Java language, which is the default language used for Jammy plugin.
    Author:
    fv

        Retrieves the project associated to the given problem if exist. Creates it using the given monitor otherwise.

        problem - Problem to retrieve project from.
        monitor - Monitor instance to use for project creation.
        Returns:
        Retrieved project instance.
        Throws:
